title: 20 killed in Syria car bomb explosion
content:
A car bomb explosion has killed at least 20 people in Syria's predominantly Kurdish northeastern city of…  
A car bomb explosion has killed at least 20 people in Syria's predominantly Kurdish northeastern city of Hassakeh. 

The official SANA news agency says Monday's attack took place in the city's al-Mahatta neighbourhood. Along with those killed, at least 40 people were reported wounded. 

In another part of the city, another car bomb blew up an hour earlier, but there was no word on casualties. 

Syrian state TV showed footage of a two-storey building that collapsed from the…
